import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import FetchSingleMovieDetails from '../../hooks/detailMovie'; import WhatsappSvg from '../../components/icons/whatsapp'; export default function MovieDetails() { const { movieId } = useParams(); const { data: movie, isLoading, isError, error } = FetchSingleMovieDetails(movieId); return ( <> {movie && (
)} ); }
